content: Trello helps me keep track of my schedule for my business, great app
Great organising and sharing app
Simple and effective for organizing tasks and projects
The flexibility of managing teams and projects makes Trello a breeze to work. It enables cohesion and uniformity in moving forward as a team.
We use this every day, we would definitely suggest downloading this it will improve your time management, organisation and everything over and above giving you more Freedom for life.

Easy to understand, easy to keep lists. Way too many bugs. When creating custom rules, these only seem to be applied 50% of the time. Calendar shows tickets on the wrong days, with no way of correcting it. And much more. Very limited in functionality. Would not be surprised if this app can be oneshotted with ChatGPT or similar, except for the cloud functionality and sync.

Quick-add keeps appearing, setting is not kept. Could you please keep my setting, not to see the quick-add !? Very annoying to hide again after every update. Reduced to one star as my settings keep being reset with each update. Very annoying.

Biggy UI and doesn't have auto save. Imagine typing a paragraph in the description and then switching apps to another one for reference or closing it and switching notes thinking it's saved and then realizing it's not because you forgot to press the green checkmark. So stupid. Luckily, I spent most of my time in a web browser. But if I had to rely on the mobile app, I would pull my hair out.
Very good and well use management app
The best app so far!! I would add a detail- for some cards to have an option for recurring action, for example to mark the same day during the entire month.
A project management tool using boards and cards to organize tasks
AMAZING
Each update makes the UI a little harder to use. Move is never what I want when I'm dragging a task. So don't make it get in the way of archiving
Very functional, even on the free version.

The web app is amazing, the mobile app is lacking and missing critical functions. How come on the mobile app I can't seem to copy a checklist easily from another card, for example? Am I the potato or are you guys just trash at UX? These little things are making me want to try a new service and I've used Trello for years now
UX on widget is not very good

the app has way less features than the web version and this not acceptable also not compatible with Tablets
App that helps to enhance productivity by improving organisation that mananging all,the personal and also the establisment Worth of apps as the management tool
it's been a good ride currently actually, I just hope the app wasn't created for a short temporary term or purpose ðŸ˜€
